trans-unit.source: DHIS2 - is not only an open-source platform for reporting, analysis, and dissemination of data, but is also an initiative supported by a global network called HISP - and a growing community of users from more than 100 countries globally.

Before getting started with the course, watch this video to get a first look at how DHIS2 is used in public health to benefit billions of people around the world. Click the play button below to start.
